body:
STRUMPACK is a parallel and algebraic linear solver and preconditioner.
It is part of the ECP project "2.3.3.07 STMS08-STRUMPACK/SuperLU: Factorization Based Sparse Solvers and Preconditioners for Exascale".

STRUMPACK can be used from PETSc and MFEM (Trilinos interface is a work in progress).
We plan to update the PETSc and MFEM spack packages once this PR is done.
title: STRUMPACK: new package
